[[Image:CathachOfStColumba.jpg|thumb|right|The [[Cathach of St. Columba]], a seventh century book of [[psalms]]. Tradition cited it as the book whose illicit transcription by [[Saint Columba]] in [[560]] AD led to the overturn of an Irish copyright ruling by force of arms.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ria.ie/library+catalogue/cathach.html |title=The Cathach / The Psalter of St. Columba |accessdate=2008-06-09 |publisher=Royal Irish Academy |date=2008-01-30}}</ref>]]
